page.title: 03SUMMARY OF AREA (PART TWO)
page.content: In the south west of our area is Hurworth Burn reservoir,which has a dam,and flowing around the dam is Mousey Burn stream,which goes under the dismantled railway,and out of our area.Another stream is Claypool Beck,which goes under the A19.The dismantled railway,goes north to south,cutting across roads,streams and fields.It is just a raised track now.We have 2 small plantations in the area,the Bowman's Plantation and the Fardenhill Plantation.Claypool Beck runs through Bowman's Plantation,which is an excellent place for bird watching.There are 2 disused mines in our area one is near South Wingate and the other is right next to Kenny's Pond,which is the only licensed pond for fishing in this area.It is owned by Hartlepool and District Angling Club.
